name: Zubayer
body: The tree looks healthy, HOWEVER a taupe decorator planter NOT!! Well it is taupe, but it is plastic and I would not even call it a planter but more a plastic sleeve around the nursery pot concealed beneath it.

name: Mahmud
body: I ordered this plant and when I opened the package half of the dirt had fallen out. I believe this is the reason it died. The roots had been damaged, probably.

name: Rofiq
body: I can't find a way to contact the company - I would like a partial refund as I will now need to buy a pot to put it in - the inner pot it comes in is the thin black plastic you'd find at a hardware store.

name: Eshak
body: Beautiful plant. Looks healthy and vibrant, much better than what I expected. Especially for my first plant order online. Packaging was tight and trouble free.

name: Saiful
body: Impressed. Packaging didn't appear stellar upon arrival, but plants arrived in excellent condition. 6-7 healthy fans of leaves on each plant. No browning. They have to be close to 4 feet high.

name: Farhad
body: This was a beautiful plant when it arrived. There were a few dried out leaves that were void of color, I figured it was due to the shipping process.
